name: cataleptic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to or similar to catalepsy (= a medical condition in which a person's body becomes stiff and stops moving, as if dead): In some cases, cataleptic instances can be brought on by extreme emotional shock. He fell into a cataleptic seizure and nearly died from it. See
catalepsy
More examplesFewer examplesCataleptic postures associated with brain lesions due to stroke may be common. I was reduced to the cataleptic state, my gaze fixed on the ceiling.She fell into a cataleptic trance.
